dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Mm~ What nice weather. Right, so who needed my protection?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: It's no easy feat to wake up early in the morning... But with weather as nice as this, you just feel refreshed when you get up, yeah?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: For lunch... let's keep it simple with donuts and coffee. What? You're sick of 'em? Too bad, these are the staple diet of a Fixer on stakeout~!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Aw, geez... Can't I take these sunglasses off? I can't see a thing through this dark tint~

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: My job~ It's to protect appointed persons. Make sure my client doesn't feel bothered at all~ I can be a natural shield like that.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: ...Fuhu, you think I might stand out? Whew~ I'm more worried about the others, really.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: A stealth mission like this... ugh, it's too boring... won't anything please happen?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Ah~ You're here? Not used to seeing me wear the Association coat? Well, I have many forms~

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Don't come too close. You'll get blood on you.
And that's... not a very good look, is it?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hnnnngh~ Phew. Lemme take a nap for a minute~

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: It's good to be recognized~ Hm... Though, I'd prefer better pay for the missions~

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Sunglasses off~

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Commencing mission.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Stay behind my back!

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Subduing target!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Phew~ Did they get knocked out cold?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Oh, oh boy...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Threat, removed~

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Ah... but... my performance records...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Heh, that's easy~

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: T-This isn't one of my specialties, y'know...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Whew~ That's another smooth-sailing mission! How about we grab a beer on the way back?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: A perfect mission! Fuhu, please hire Zwei again!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Crap... Now I've got letters of explanation to write... Sniffle.
